scripts.start: huel build --env development --debug -w -p 1337 -t src/index.html -e src/index.js -o dist/
scripts.start-prod: huel build --env production --debug -w -p 1337 -t src/index.html -e src/index.js -o dist/
scripts.build: huel build --env production -t src/index.html -e src/index.js -o dist/
scripts.build-debug: huel build --env production --debug -t src/index.html -e src/index.js -o dist/
scripts.changelog: huel changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "chore: update changelog"
